name: SKYGRAVE
description:
Welcome to the world of SKYGRAVE!  Battle fast flying enemies and collect cool powerups that will aid in your survival.   A few bosses are out to see you get destroyed.  What will you do to survive?  How far can you go?  The battle awaits!

Controls:

W, A, S, D Keys and Arrow Keys - Move Ship

B Key - Bomb Drop

Space Bar - Shoot (Hold for continuous fire)

Esc Key - Pause/ Unpause Game

UPDATES COMING FOR EVEN MORE ENEMIES, MORE BOSSES, AND MORE ENVIRONMENTS!!!

GET IN THE GAME!

-OLD GAMER FEDERATION
